title: Business Analyst
description:
About Us:

Fusion Practices is a leading consultancy specializing in delivering data-driven projects and finance transformations in partnership with Oracle and Microsoft. We offer consulting and advisory solutions to clients worldwide. Our expertise in Oracle Applications, Microsoft Azure Data Hub, and PaaS enables us to deliver best-in-class solutions.

Job Overview:

We are seeking a detail-oriented and analytical Business Analyst to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for gathering and analyzing business requirements, managing data collection, handling end-to-end User Acceptance Testing (UAT), and performing system configurations to align with business needs.

Key Responsibilities:


Collaborate with stakeholders to collect, analyze, and document business requirements.
Define and translate business needs into functional specifications.
Ensure clear communication between business teams and technical teams.
Identify key data sources and extract insights to support business decision-making.
Develop UAT plans, test cases, and scripts based on business requirements.
Coordinate with users for UAT execution, track defects, and ensure issue resolution and Validate system changes before final implementation.
Perform system configurations as per business needs.
Ensure proper setup and customization of applications and workflows.


Requirements

Skills & Qualifications:


3-5 years in business analysis, requirement gathering, and UAT.
Strong understanding of business processes, data analysis, and system configurations.
Proficiency in using business analysis tools like JIRA, Confluence, SQL, and reporting tools.
Ability to work with stakeholders across departments and translate business needs into actionable solutions.
